abstracts.cdata!:
This Economic Recovery Credit Project
            aims at supporting the government's efforts to reduce
            the economy's dependence on oil and remove the
            impediments facing private investors. Key supporting policy
            reforms to achieve the government's broad objectives
            may be combined under three groups: improvements in public
            sector efficiency, development of the country's
            productive sectors, and satisfaction of social needs.
